channel.title: django on Maurício Antunes
channel.description: Recent content in django on Maurício Antunes

item.title: Passing custom parameters to Django formset forms
item.description: An usual question on sites like StackOverflow is: how do I pass a custom parameter to a formset form? You will end up finding lots of ways to do it. But the most used (at least the more reasonable answer) uses some hard to understand constructions. Let’s say we have an app with two models: Author and Book. The problem I want to make it possible for the users of my product to add new books on my site.
